attributes.action: make appointments of Special Advisors subject to parliamentary scrutiny
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the appointments of special advisors are subject to parliamentary scrutiny, limiting the number each department can have, and to issue a limit on salary that can be paid.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
